columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the blob

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a blob uniquely

columns.name: storage_account_name
columns.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated

columns.name: automatic_snapshot_policy_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether automatic snapshot creation is enabled, or not

columns.name: change_feed_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether change feed event logging is enabled for the Blob service

columns.name: default_service_version
columns.description: Indicates the default version to use for requests to the Blob service if an incoming request’s version is not specified

columns.name: is_versioning_enabled
columns.description: Specifies whether the versioning is enabled, or not

columns.name: container_delete_retention_policy
columns.description: The blob service properties for container soft delete

columns.name: cors_rules
columns.description: A list of CORS rules for a storage account’s Blob service

columns.name: delete_retention_policy
columns.description: The blob service properties for blob soft delete

columns.name: restore_policy
columns.description: The blob service properties for blob restore policy
